summary: This bill, the Modernizing Government Technology Reform Act, amends the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018. It aims to improve the effectiveness of the Technology Modernization Fund by clarifying fund usage for modernizing and securing government IT systems.  The bill also introduces new requirements for agency Chief Information Officers to inventory legacy IT systems and for the Federal CIO to compile and prioritize a high-risk system list, reporting these to Congress. The bill also includes guidelines on fund repayment to ensure the fund remains operational.
